name: Islands of Wakfu
summary:
Island of Wakfu is an action-adventure game developed by Ankama Play and published by Microsoft Studios for the Xbox 360's Xbox Live Arcade service.It is set in the universe of Dofus and is a spin-off of the MMORPG Wakfu.

Taking place 10,000 years before the events of Dofus, in the game, players assume the roles of Nora (the last surviving Eliatrope) and her dragon brother Efrim of whom are on a mission to reserve and restore the remains of their world, after a meteorite crashed on a nearby planet, reviving a malevolent curse.
